Articles.Content:
Soooo....I read about the optimization of load times that is supposed to have happened. Not for me. I went from load times that took a couple minutes to the current load time of about 15 minutes. ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

I have a Steam installation, which has never given me problems, and verified it installed in the usual location. No other games are showing increased load times, just KSP.

The game runs great once fully loaded, and screen switching in-game is normal or possibly quicker than it was before.

Happening to anyone else?

Little help?

Thanks in advance!

Can you please see the support stickies Knorf, we'll need your game logs, they may help to figure out what's going on ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
